rrhvella.coursework1

Class StructuredPolyphonicLSystemNotator

  • java.lang.Object
    • rrhvella.coursework1.StructuredPolyphonicLSystemNotator

  • public class StructuredPolyphonicLSystemNotator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates a MIDI sequence based on the outputs of context-sensitive stochastic L-systems. The purpose of this class is to generate a score which exhibits strong elements of polyphony as well as musical structure.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  StructuredPolyphonicLSystemNotator.TokenAnalysis
      Analyses the structure string, and uses the other information provided by the user to generate and organise the tokens for this piece.

      The number of crochets in a bar.
      static int MAX_MELODY_ITERATIONS
      The maximum number of iterations which will be performed on the L-system which generates the melody.

      The maximum number of bars in a phrase.

      The velocity of the notes in the score.

      The minimum number of iterations which will be performed on the L-system which generates the melody.

      The lowest octave which can be occupied by a voice in this piece.

      The minimum number of bars in a phrase.

    • Method Detail

      • getSequence

        public static javax.sound.midi.Sequence getSequence(Note tonic,
                                    Scale scaleType,
                                    java.lang.String structure)
                                             throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        Generate and return a MIDI sequence based on the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        tonic - the tonic for this piece.
        scaleType - the scale for this piece.
        structure - the structure of this piece, in the format of a string of repeating characters ("aba" means "first a, then b, then a again").
        Returns:
        the generated MIDI sequence.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
